amendment.description: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to require fingerprints on United States passports and to require countries desiring to participate in the Visa Waiver Program to issue passports that conform to the biometric standards required for United States passports.

action.text: Amendment SA 3872 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3872.

Amendment SA 3872 proposed by Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S10345-10346) To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to require fingerprints on United States passports and to require countries desiring to participate in the Visa Waiver Program to issue passports that conform to the biometric standards required for United States passports.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3872 proposed by Senator Sessions.
